channel.title: How to add "Warning!" interface
channel.description:
Some people are dumb and click the RFD portal, how do I add a warning sign saying "You are about to enter a items left on death minigame, are you sure you want to enter?" "yes" "no"
Something like that, if you could help me that be great!
Thanks.

item.title: How to add "Warning!" interface
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

I don’t think that interface is in 317/377, but you could show a message like.
—> Would you like to enter <----
Yes.
No.

Read full topic
